input.sentences: i went for a hike in the woods .
i saw a snake but i do n't think it showed in this picture .
it actually looks beautiful in this picture .
i thought the electricity posts were a stark contrast against the nature around me .
output.sentences: While hiking through the woods we enjoy the solitude.
We appreciate the green life pushing up through the leaves as we pass.
As the years go by we see the expansion of the city into our sanctuary.
Once clear and clean water looks the same, but no longer supports life.
The hungry machine of human progress can not be sated.
